item.title: Command issue
item.dc:creator: @h3rbl0re h3rbl0re
item.description:
@h3rbl0re wrote:

My ::master, ::pure, ::zerker, and ::tank commands dont work. Here are the codes: Help is appreciated! Thanks!

if (cmd[0].equals(“zerker”)) {if (p.wildernessZone(p.absX, p.absY)) {
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “You cannot use this command inside of the wilderness.”);
return;
}
